jalse.actions

Class ThreadPoolActionEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • jalse.actions.AbstractActionEngine
      • jalse.actions.ThreadPoolActionEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionEngine

    public class ThreadPoolActionEngine
extends AbstractActionEngine
    An implementation of ActionEngine based on ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.
    Author:
    Elliot Ford
